divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting in my pool, relaxing when I saw an orange orb fly over my house (est. 350 ft.) then, after that, I've seen lights, every once in a while in the air. Now, after I told you guys about it on facebook, in bed I saw a Pale bluish light float past a window, as of someone was holding a dim, bluish, flashlight near the glass.
Summary: orange orb flies over house, later, after i tell you guys about it on facebook, ghostly blue light floats past window
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Fort Smith
There were no other sightings in Fort Smith on or around June 30th 2009
